Room.Name: Fish Camp
Room.ShortDescription: You are on the banks of the Ashton River in a pleasant little fish camp.
Room.LongDescription: The river flows rapidly to the west, eventually making its way to the Nylandian Bay on the Respitial Sea. A camp fire still smolders here, and someone has stocked a camp kitchen with everything needed to fix a meal. the trees provide a nice canopy overhead, giving this place a comfortable and relaxing feeling.
